name: Let them sUffEr
description:
Hey!

this is my second game ever Let them sUffEr.
Here you play as Johnson who kills people in cold blood to loot their guns. 
This is an RPG there are 5 guns in the game: The starter Pistol, The Cursed gun, The Spiraler, The Blaster and last but most certainly not least the Shotgun. 

You can find the controls explained in game but for refence both the arrow keys and WASD are movement controls and you can choose which one you prefer. 

Have fun Slaughtering! :D
